Package com.example.developerunknown

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptedListFragment
    CMPUT 301 Part 4 - Book borrowing app- AcceptingList Fragment The accept list fragment creates a separate list to view all accepted books that the owner has requested from someone else Nov 28, 2020 No Copyright
    AccountFragment
    this class generally displays all current user information related stuff
    AccountUITest  
    AddBookFragment
    This is a class allows user to add book to booklist and extends fragment
    Book
    Book Class implements Serializability and its interface
    BookHomeFragment
    a Fragment that contains some child fragment by applying ViewPagerAdapter, customer can view specific book information for borrower and owner,there are different fragments to view
    BookList
    This class defines initializes an ArrayList and extends adapters
    BookListFragment
    booklistfragment displays the Owner books, and wishlist books
    BookListFragmentTest  
    BookTest  
    BorrowedListFragment
    This is a list fragment for the users borrowed books list as a borrower
    BorrowerViewAcceptedFragment
    Allows borrower to view books hat they have been accepted from someone else and perform confirm borrow action.
    BorrowerViewBorrowedFragment
    Allows borrower to view books hat they have borrowered from someone else and perform return action.
    BorrowerViewGeneralFragment
    this class is a view book fragment,but there is no special functionality on it,just purely view book as a non-owner
    ConfirmAddress
    Confirm address is a dialog fragment, that makes user confirm the selected location that was just clicked and sets the pick up/ drop off location
    CustomList
    Similar to BookList- extends ArrayAdapter
    EditBookFragment
    allow user to edit a book that belongs to them
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    HomeFragment
    HomeFragment is used to display notification of user,it is also the default interface when user logged in
    LoginActivity
    this class hold is in fact first fully operated class in this project,it will get the username and password entered,and compare with firestore,a trick is applied here,since in user stories,we should focus on userName but the firebase auth only has email and password,and UID so I stored a key value pair about userName and email/Uid,therefore user can log in using username
    MainActivity
    start intent of whole program Controls main fragments such as Home, BookListFragment and Login-activity
    MyAppGlideModule  
    NotificationList
    Creates a list of user Notifications
    OwnerViewAcceptedFragment
    allows owner to view book information and perform denote borrow action if the status of book is accepted
    OwnerViewBorrowedFragment
    allows owner to view book information and perform comfirm return action if the status of book is accepted
    Photographs
    This is a class that do upload, delete, and view functions on Image
    Request
    initializes information for the request activites and list
    requestActicity
    this class handles situation when user accepts a request and pick meeting location
    requestFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    RequestHistoryList
    This class shows a list of books the current user has ever requested
    RequestList
    holds the view for the requestlist
    RequestListFragment
    this class shows a list of books that the user is currently requesting
    RequestUITest  
    resultActivity
    shows the specific information of one of the book user obtained by searching,and allow currently user to request the book
    Scanner
    Scans book ISBN this class is inspired from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=drH63NpSWyk&t=4s *Citation URL:https://github.com/yuriy-budiyev/code-scanner authorï¼šhttps://stackoverflow.com/users/1992715/android-coder date:Dec 6,2018 license:MIT License Copyright (c) 2017 Yuriy Budiyev [yuriy.budiyev@yandex.ru]
    SearchFragment
    Creates fragment to allow user search existing book and show searchlist view
    SearchUITest  
    SearchUserDialogFragment
    this class is used to display searched user when user enter a specific userName and tap search in AccountFragment
    SignUpActivity
    provide anything necessary for a new user to register a new account
    User
    Defines user information
    UserNotification
    this class is used for displaying notification received by current user
    UserTest  
    ViewBookFragment
    allows user to view book information in detail
    ViewPagerAdapter
    this is a viewPagerAdapter to arrange child fragments,mainly applied to view different book list according to their specific features
    ViewRequestsFragment
    allows user to see a list of requests on one of his/her book and perform future actions
